attributes.action: request that Her Majesty The Queen confer a knighthood upon Michael Palin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Palin is a British institution. His contribution to British television is on a scale matched by few others. He has entertained and educated people both in Britain and abroad through his extensive work for both television and film. His travel documentaries alone stand as timeless pieces of sagacity which have enlightened and inspired millions. He has also used his celebrity status to promote various good causes. Yet, for whatever reason, he has yet to be bestowed the honour conferred upon so many of his peers. I think it is time the Prime Minister rectified this and request that Her Majesty The Queen knight Michael Palin.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
